properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ninnu viduvanu nenu andaru ninnu vidichinanu Ninnu ennadu edabaayanu nenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesuni polamulo panichesedi daasulandarikide vaaghdaanamu aatmala panta koyunapudu meetho nundunu nenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dustudu niruthsaaha parachunu kastapadinanu phalithamu ledani istamugaa pani cheyumu neevu shrestu dosagunu jayamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kaayamunandu viththina neevu kshayamanu pantanu kothuvu aathmeeyamugaa viththina kothuvu Nitya jeevapu panta{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Maanavulanu lekkinchakumu praanula prabhukai sampaadimpa ninu krunga jeyu Nishmaayeleppudu kanu Missaakulo jayamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Manaku maadiri kristu nunchenu thana swaroopa munaku maarunatlu manamu prabhuni polunatlu aathma cheyun manalan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Manadu swaardhamu povunatlu aayanatho shrama padutaye maargamu kristu swaroopa merpadu manalo agni pareeksha yandu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jalamulalo daatunapudu jwaalalandu naduchu napudu balamugaa meeku thodai yundi nilipedanu Naa drushti{/lang-eng}
